title: Soul of Blight
summaries: Souls of Blight are crafting materials dropped by Ocram, an exclusive boss. They are used to craft exclusive weapons and armor.
Crafting all weapons and armor sets costs 205 Souls of Blight, so the player must defeat Ocram a total of [img:Old-gen console version] 13–41 / [img:Nintendo 3DS version] 9–14 times.
On Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, Ocram drops more souls and, unlike other souls, they are affected by gravity.

statistics.Tooltip: The essence of infected creatures’ [sic]
statistics.Sell: 2
